meta.name: Transform Meeting Transcripts into LinkedIn Content with AI and Google Docs

parameters.message:
Hi there!

Your meeting has just ended, and I'm ready to help you create an engaging LinkedIn post from your discussion.

What I need from you:
Please reply to this email with your meeting transcript (copy and paste the text directly into your reply).

What happens next:
Once I receive your transcript, I'll automatically:

üëâ Analyze the key discussion points
üëâ Extract valuable insights and takeaways
üëâ Create a professional LinkedIn post
üëâ Format it for maximum engagement

How to get your transcript:

üëâ Zoom: Go to your Zoom account ‚Üí Recordings ‚Üí Find your meeting ‚Üí Download transcript
üëâ Teams: Check your meeting chat or recording folder for the transcript file
üëâ Google Meet: If recorded, check your Google Drive for the transcript
üëâ Other platforms: Look for "Transcript" or "Recording" options in your meeting platform

Simply copy the transcript text and paste it as a reply to this email - no need to format it perfectly, I'll handle that!

Looking forward to creating your LinkedIn content! üöÄ

This is an automated message from your n8n workflow. Simply reply with your transcript to continue.
parameters.subject: =Action Required: Meeting Transcript for LinkedIn Post Creation -  {{ $('Filter Unwanted Event Type').first().json.summary }}

values.placeholder: Any specific points to highlight, hashtags to include, or special instructions?

parameters.text:
=You are X , a LinkedIn content creator assistant.

LINKEDIN INSTRUCTIONS TO FOLLOW:
Use the comprehensive LinkedIn guidelines stored in memory - reference X's voice, style, content approach, and brand elements.

POST LENGTH REQUIREMENTS:
- LinkedIn posts should be 1,300-3,000 characters for optimal engagement
- Aim for 150-300 words
- Keep it concise but engaging

USER INPUT:
- Meeting Transcript: {{ $json.data['Meeting Transcript'] }}
- Post Type: {{ $json.data['Post Type'] }}
- Tone: {{ $json.data['Tone of Voice'] }}
- Additional Instructions: {{ $json.data['Additional Instructions (Optional)'] }}

CRITICAL INSTRUCTIONS:
1. You MUST use the actual meeting transcript provided above
2. Extract key insights, learnings, or takeaways from the meeting content
3. Follow X's voice and style guidelines from memory
4. Match the requested tone and post type
5. Do NOT create fictional content or made-up scenarios
6. Base everything on the real meeting transcript provided

OUTPUT FORMAT REQUIREMENT:
You MUST respond with a valid JSON object in exactly this format:
{
  "post_title": "Your engaging post title here",
  "post_content": "Your complete LinkedIn post content here"
}

Do not include any text before or after the JSON object. Only return the JSON.

=You are X, a LinkedIn content creator assistant.

Use the comprehensive LinkedIn guidelines stored in memory - reference X's voice, style, content approach, and brand elements.

POST LENGTH REQUIREMENTS:
- LinkedIn posts should be 1,300-3,000 characters for optimal engagement
- Aim for 150-300 words
- Keep it concise but engaging

USER INPUT:

- Post Type: {{ $json.data['Post Type'] }}
- Tone: {{ $json.data['Tone of Voice'] }}
- Additional Instructions: {{ $json.data['Additional Instructions (Optional)'] }}

3. Follow X's voice and style guidelines from memory

parameters.content:
## üéØ Universal Meeting Transcript to LinkedIn Content

### Automatically transform your meeting insights into engaging LinkedIn content with AI

Perfect for coaches, consultants, sales professionals, and content creators who want to share valuable insights from their meetings without the manual effort of content creation.

### How it works
* Calendar trigger detects when your coaching/meeting ends
* Waits for meeting completion, then sends you a form via email
* You provide the meeting transcript and specify post preferences
* AI analyzes the transcript using your personal brand guidelines
* Generates professional LinkedIn content based on real insights
* Creates organized Google Docs with both transcript and final post
* Sends you links to review and publish your content

### How to use
* Connect your Google Calendar and Gmail accounts
* Update the calendar filter to match your meeting types
* Customize the AI prompts with your brand voice and style
* Replace email addresses with your own
* Test with a sample meeting transcript

### Requirements
* Google Calendar (for meeting detection)
* Gmail (for form delivery and notifications)
* Google Drive & Docs (for content storage)
* LangChain AI nodes (for content generation)

### Good to know
* AI processing may incur costs based on your LangChain provider
* Works with any meeting platform - just copy/paste transcripts
* Can be adapted to use webhooks from recording tools like Fireflies.ai
* Memory nodes store your brand guidelines for consistent output

Happy Content Creating!

## 1. Meeting Detection & Filtering
[Read more about the Google Calendar Trigger node](https://docs.n8n.io/integrations/builtin/trigger-nodes/n8n-nodes-base.googlecalendartrigger/)

Monitors your calendar for meeting events and filters for specific types (like coaching sessions). Only processes meetings containing your specified keywords to avoid triggering on personal appointments.

## 2. Smart Wait for Meeting End
[Read more about the Wait node](https://docs.n8n.io/integrations/builtin/core-nodes/n8n-nodes-base.wait/)

Automatically waits until your meeting officially ends before requesting the transcript. This ensures you're not interrupted during your session and gives you time to export transcripts from your meeting platform.

## 3. Interactive Transcript Collection
[Read more about the Gmail node](https://docs.n8n.io/integrations/builtin/app-nodes/n8n-nodes-base.gmail/)

Sends you a user-friendly form to collect your meeting transcript along with preferences for tone, post type, and any special instructions. Works with transcripts from any platform - Zoom, Teams, Meet, etc.

## 4. AI-Powered Content Creation
[Read more about the AI Agent node](https://docs.n8n.io/integrations/builtin/cluster-nodes/root-nodes/n8n-nodes-langchain.agent/)

Uses advanced AI to analyze your transcript and create LinkedIn content that matches your brand voice. Separate agents handle personal vs company posts, ensuring the right tone and messaging for each audience.

## 5. Organized Content Storage
[Read more about the Google Docs node](https://docs.n8n.io/integrations/builtin/app-nodes/n8n-nodes-base.googledocs/)

Creates a dedicated folder structure with two documents: your original transcript for reference and your polished LinkedIn post ready to copy and publish. Everything stays organized and accessible.

### ‚ö†Ô∏è Credentials & Setup Required!
This workflow requires multiple OAuth2 credentials and AI configuration.

1. Google Calendar OAuth2 credentials
2. Gmail OAuth2 credentials  
3. Google Drive OAuth2 credentials
4. AI provider credentials (OpenAI, Anthropic, etc.)
5. Configure memory nodes with your brand guidelines
6. Update prompt to suit your need
6. Test with sample data before going live
